Action.body: I have added a script to the fabric-samples/bin directory that will allow the user control over the download of docker images independent of installing the binaries https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/c/11843/.|https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/c/11843/ It should be available in the default branch on GH when 1.0.1 is formally released.
